                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 1</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>160 m ব্যাসার্ধের একটি আনুভূমিক সমতল রাস্তার বাঁকে একটি মোটর গাড়ি সর্বোচ্চ কত
                                        বেগে চলতে পারে?&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.25</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm \frac{mv^2}{r}=\mu mg\Rightarrow v^2=\mu rg</script>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>0.25</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>160</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></msqrt><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">

                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mi>μ</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mn>0.25</mn>
                                        <mo>×</mo>
                                        <mn>160</mn>
                                        <mo>×</mo>
                                        <mn>10</mn>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>20</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \Rightarrow v=\sqrt{\mu rg}=\sqrt{0.25\times160\times10}\therefore v=20\ ms^{-1}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi>&amp;#x03BC;</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">
                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-74" style="width: 5.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.863em, 1004.22em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-75"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-76"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.27em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-77"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-78" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-79"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-80" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.371em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-81" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.568em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.686em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.121em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-82" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-83" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-84" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">μ</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-85" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-86" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-87" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-88" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.702em;"></span></span>
                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                        <mfrac>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                                <msup>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                                </msup>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                        </mfrac>
                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                        <mi>μ</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    </math></span>
                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm \frac{mv^2}{r}=\mu mg\ \ </script>
                        </span></strong>;&nbsp;সূত্রের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p>মান বসানোর জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-89" style="width: 5.576em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.3em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-90"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-91" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-92" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-93" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-94" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-96"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-98"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-99"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-100" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>20</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm v=20\ ms^{-1}\ </script>
                    </span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান
                    বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>200</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>?</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-129" style="width: 16.805em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.773em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>200</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mo>;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mo>;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>10</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>?</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm r=200\ m\ ;x=1\ m;v=10\ ms^{-1};h=?</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>আমরা জানি,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mn>200</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-159" style="width: 16.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1013.61em, 2.584em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-160"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-161"><span style="display: inline-block;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                                <mn>10</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>200</mn>
                                            <mo>×</mo>
                                            <mn>10</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0.05</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>.</mo>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm \frac{h}{x}=\frac{v^2}{rg}\Rightarrow\frac{h}{1}=\frac{{10}^2}{200\times10}=0.05m\ (Ans.)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi></mrow></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="width: 3.158em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.584em; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.53em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.535em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>

                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>

                                        </mrow>
                                    </mfrac>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm \frac{h}{x}=\frac{v^2}{rg}</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;; সূত্রের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
                    সূত্রে মান বসানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>h</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0.05</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-210" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.69em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-211"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">h</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.05</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-215" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">h</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0.05</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm h=0.05m</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
                    <strong>[বি.দ্র.: </strong>একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে। সূত্র না লিখে
                    সরাসরি মান বসালেও গ্রহণযোগ্য হবে।]
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 3</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>একটি চলমান বস্তুর উপর t সময়ে প্রযুক্ত বল, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-216" style="width: 3.504em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.871em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.418em, 1002.8em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-217"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.957em;"></span></span>
                                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                                    </math></span>
                                            </span>
                                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm F=kt</script>
                                        </span> ক্রিয়া করা শুরু করল। বল প্রয়োগের মুহূর্তে প্রাথমিক ভরবেগ p হলে, কত সময়
                                        পর তা দ্বিগুণ হবে?</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-222" style="width: 14.018em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.477em; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm F=\frac{dp}{dt}\Rightarrow kt=\frac{dp}{dt}\therefore dp=kt\ dt</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msubsup><mo>&amp;#x222B;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><msubsup><mo>&amp;#x222B;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>0</mn></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></mrow></msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msubsup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>]</mo></mrow><mn>0</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi></msubsup></math>" role="presentation">

                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                        </mrow>

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>

                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>

                                            <mfrac>
                                                <msup>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>

                                                </msup>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </mfrac>

                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>0</mn>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                    </msubsup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm \int_{p}^{2p}dp=k\int_{0}^{t}tdt\Rightarrow2p-p=k\ \left[\frac{t^2}{2}\right]_0^t</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mfrac><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-298" style="width: 9.92em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1008.12em, 2.871em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-299"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-303" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-304"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.58em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.285em;"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-305"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.576em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.26em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="font-size: 50%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-308" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.7em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-309" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">t</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.912em, 1001.11em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.986em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-313"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-314"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.863em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.74em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-315"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.203em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.86em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.863em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.23em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.957em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.232em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.535em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.096em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mfrac>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                        </mfrac>
                                    </msqrt>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm \Rightarrow p=k\frac{t^2}{2}\therefore t=\sqrt{\frac{2p}{k}}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><b>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</b></p>

                <p><b><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">
                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="width: 5.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.182em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.94em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-320"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">d</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">t</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    </math></span>
                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm dp=kt\ dt\ \ </script>
                        </span></b>;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></mfrac></msqrt></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="width: 3.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.24em; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-335" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-338"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em);                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">t</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mfrac>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                        </mfrac>
                                    </msqrt>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm t=\sqrt{\frac{2p}{k}}</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০২ নম্বর।</p>

                <p>[<b>বি</b><b>.দ্রঃ</b> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 4</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>600 kg ভরের একটি গাড়ি 5 m/s দ্রুতিতে 400 kg ভরের স্থির গাড়িকে ধাক্কা দিল।
                                        ধাক্কার পর গাড়ি দুটি একত্রিত হয়ে 45 m পিছলিয়ে থেমে গেল। বাধাদানকারী বলের মান কত?
                                    </td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="width: 12.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.92em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm m_1u_1+m_2u_2=(m_1+m_2)v</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>600</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>400</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>600</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>400</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-368" style="width: 16.928em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.855em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1013.86em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-369"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">600</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-372" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-375" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">400</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-381"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">600</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-383" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">400</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-386" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>600</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>400</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>600</mn>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                            <mn>400</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm\Rightarrow600\times5+400\times0=\left(600+400\right)\times v</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>600</mn></mrow><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-388" style="width: 9.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.035em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>5</mn>
                                            <mo>×</mo>
                                            <mn>600</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>1000</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm \Rightarrow v=\frac{5\times600}{1000}=3\ ms^{-1}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>45</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="width: 14.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.133em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </mrow>

                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>

                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>45</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm v^{\prime2}=v^2-2as\Rightarrow0=3^2-2a\times45</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>90</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="width: 8.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.3em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-441" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">90</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>9</mn>
                                        <mn>90</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0.1</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm \therefore a=\frac{9}{90}=0.1\ m/s^2</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>400</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>600</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-454" style="width: 16.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1013.86em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-455"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-457" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-463" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-464"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">400</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">600</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0.1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>400</mn>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                            <mn>600</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>0.1</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>100</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm \therefore F=ma=\left(400+600\right)\times0.1=100\ N</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">

                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\rm m_1u_1+m_2u_2=(m_1+m_2)v</script>
                        </span></strong>&nbsp;;&nbsp;সূত্র লেখার জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.53em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-502"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-509"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-510" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm v=3\ m/s</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>90</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="width: 7.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.52em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-513"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-514" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-515" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-516" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-528" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;
