                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>9</mn>
                                        <mn>90</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0.1</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm a=\frac{9}{90}=0.1\ m/s^2</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    সূত্র <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-529" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.75em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-530"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-531" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-532" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-533" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-534" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm F=ma</script>
                    </span> সূত্র লেখার জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-535" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.65em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-536"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-537" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-538" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-539" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-540" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-541" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>100</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm F=100\ N</script>
                    </span> মান নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি
                    মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 5</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>3000 kg ভরের একটি গাড়ি 30 m ব্যাসার্ধের বৃত্তাকার পথে বাঁক নেবার সময় রাস্তার
                                        প্রতিক্রিয়া বল হয় 50000 N। রাস্তার ব্যাংকিং কোণ ও গাড়িটির বেগ নির্ণয়
                                        কর।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 7.118em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-6" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">10</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-8" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-9"><span style="display: inline-block;                                                 </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                                        <mo stretchy="false">[</mo>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                                        <mn>10</mn>
                                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                                        <msup>
                                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                                            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                                            </mrow>
                                                        </msup>
                                                        <mo stretchy="false">]</mo>
                                                    </math></span>
                                            </span>
                                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm [g=10\ ms^{-2}]</script>
                                        </span></td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 100px; height: 104px;"></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>R</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>3000</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn></mrow><mn>50000</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-16" style="width: 13.035em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.66em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-17"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-18" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">R</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-19" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-20" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-21" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-22" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-23" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-24" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-25" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-26" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-27" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-28" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-29" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-30" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-31" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-32" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1002.62em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.35em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-33"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-34" style="font-size: 70.7%; top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.9em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-37" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">50000</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.79em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.789em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">R</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>3000</mn>
                                            <mo>×</mo>
                                            <mn>10</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>50000</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-2">\rm Rcos\theta=mg\Rightarrow cos\theta=\frac{3000\times10}{50000}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-3-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><msup><mi>cos</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>&amp;#x2061;</mo><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>3</mn><mn>5</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-38" style="width: 10.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.281em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1008.2em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-39"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-40" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-41" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic; padding-left: 0.289em;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-42" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-43" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.31em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-44" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">cos</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 1.355em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-45"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-46"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-47" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-48" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-49"></span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-50" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-51"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-52"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-53" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">(</span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-54"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-55" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-56" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-57" style="vertical-align: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">)</span></span></span></span></span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-58" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-59" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-60" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-61" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-62" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-63" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-64" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi>cos</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>⁡</mo>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mfrac>
                                                <mn>3</mn>
                                                <mn>5</mn>
                                            </mfrac>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>.</mo>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-3">\rm \therefore\theta=\cos^{-1}{\left(\frac{3}{5}\right)}\ (Ans.)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>t</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi></msqrt><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>30</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mn>3</mn></mfrac></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msqrt><mn>400</mn></msqrt><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-65" style="width: 29.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 24.387em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.658em, 1024.31em, 2.707em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-66"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-67" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-68" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1003.08em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.076em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.379em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.395em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.887em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute;                     <strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>

                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>20</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-143" style="width: 5.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.346em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1004.35em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-144"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-145" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">20</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-150"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-151" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-152"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-153"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-154" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-155" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>20</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm v=20\ ms^{-1}</script>
                    </span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 6</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>2 kg ভরের বস্তুকে 1 m দৈর্ঘ্যের সুতায় বেঁধে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-1-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1" style="width: 3.653em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.982em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1002.98em, 2.349em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-3" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-4" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-5" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-6"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.38em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.37em, 4.1em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-7" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-8"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-9"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-10" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-11" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.043em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.139em;"></span></span>
                                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                                        <msup>
                                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                                            <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                                <mn>1</mn>
                                                            </mrow>
                                                        </msup>
                                                    </math></span>
                                            </span>
                                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-1">\rm 2\ ms^{-1}</script>
                                        </span>&nbsp;সমদ্রুতিতে উল্লম্ব তলে ঘুরানো হচ্ছে। বস্তুটির কৌণিক ভরবেগ এবং
                                        বস্তুটি যখন অভিকর্ষের সাথে 60° কোণ উৎপন্ন করে থাকে তখন সুতার টান নির্ণয়
                                        কর।&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-2-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>[</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>10</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>]</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-12" style="width: 7.118em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative;                 <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-4-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>&amp;#xD7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>60</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#xB0;</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></mrow><mn>1</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>18</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">

width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-95" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-96" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-97" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-98" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-101" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-102" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-103" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">60</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-104"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-105"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-106" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">°</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-107" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-108" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.682em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; padding-left: 0.166em;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mn>60</mn>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>°</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                            <msup>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </msup>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>10</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mn>60</mn>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>°</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                            <mo>×</mo>
                                            <msup>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </msup>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>18</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>.</mo>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-4">\rm T=mg\ cos60°+\frac{mv^2}{r}= 2×10×cos60°+\frac{2\times2^2}{1}=18\ N\ (Ans.)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-5-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-127" style="width: 6.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.248em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-138"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>

                                    </msup>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>

                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-5">\rm L=4\ kgm^2s^{-1}</script>
                    </span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০১ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-6-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>T</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>18</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-144" style="width: 4.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.363em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.32em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-145"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-146" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">T</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-147" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-148" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">18</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-149" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-150" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">T</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>18</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-6">\rm T=18\ N</script>
                    </span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    &nbsp;<strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 7</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>300 kg ভরের একটি গাড়ি 10 m/s দ্রুতিতে 700 kg ভরের স্থির গাড়িকে ধাক্কা দিল।
                                        বাধাদানকারী বলের মান 2000 N হলে ধাক্কার পর গাড়ি দুটি একত্রিত হয়ে কত দূরত্ব
                                        পিছলিয়ে যাবে?</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-7">\rm m_1u_1+m_2u_2=(m_1+m_2)v</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>300</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>10</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>700</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>300</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>700</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-182" style="width: 16.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1013.45em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-183"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-184" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">300</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-186" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">700</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-193" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-195"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">300</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">700</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">v</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>300</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>10</mn>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>700</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>300</mn>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                            <mn>700</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \Rightarrow300\times10+700\times0=\left(300+700\right)v</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-201" style="width: 5.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.633em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1004.59em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-202"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-206" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-209"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-210"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-212" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm \Rightarrow v=3\ m/s</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2000</mn><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-213" style="width: 12.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.207em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>2000</mn>
                                        <mn>1000</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm F=ma\therefore a=\frac{2000}{1000}=2\ m/s^2</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-235" style="width: 15.617em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.789em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>

                                        <mn>2</mn>

                                    <msup>

                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>

                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>

                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm {v_1}^2=v^2-2as\Rightarrow0=3^2-2\times2\times s</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2.25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-264" style="width: 7.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.273em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1006.27em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-265"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-273" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.25</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>9</mn>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2.25</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm \therefore s=\frac{9}{4}=2.25\ m</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-276" style="width: 12.133em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-280" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-281"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-288"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-290" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-292" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                                 </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                        <msub>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </msub>
                                        <msub>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </msub>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <msub>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msub>
                                        <msub>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">u</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msub>
                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                        <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                        <msub>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </msub>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <msub>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msub>
                                        <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    </math></span>
                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm m_1u_1+m_2u_2=(m_1+m_2)v</script>
                        </span></strong>&nbsp;সূত্র লেখার জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-302" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.53em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-303"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-304" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-305" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-306" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-307" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-308" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-309"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-310"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm v=3\ m/s</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="width: 4.756em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1003.89em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-314"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-320"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-321"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-322" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-323"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm a=2\ m/s^2</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-326" style="width: 6.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-333" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-339" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block;
