                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <msub>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                                <mn>1</mn>
                                            </msub>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm {v_1}^2=v^2-2as </script>
                    </span>&nbsp;সূত্র লেখার জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2.25</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="width: 4.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.773em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1003.77em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-344"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-345" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2.25</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2.25</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm s=2.25\ m</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;এর মান নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি মান
                    বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 8</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>600 kg ভরের একটি গাড়ি 5 m/s দ্রুতিতে 400 kg ভরের স্থির গাড়িকে ধাক্কা দিল।
                                        ধাক্কার পর গাড়ি দুটি একত্রিত হয়ে 45 m পিছলিয়ে থেমে গেল। বাধাদানকারী বলের মান কত?
                                    </td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-7-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-8-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>600</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>400</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>600</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>400</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">

                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>

                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                    <mo>+</mo>

                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>

                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>600</mn>

                                            <mn>400</mn>

                                        <mo>)</mo>

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-8">\rm \Rightarrow600\times5+400\times0=\left(600+400\right)\times v</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-9-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>600</mn></mrow><mn>1000</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-197" style="width: 9.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.035em; margin-left: -0.982em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-203"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-204" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-205" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.09em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                                     <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>5</mn>
                                            <mo>×</mo>
                                            <mn>600</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>1000</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-9">\rm \Rightarrow v=\frac{5\times600}{1000}=3\ ms^{-1}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-10-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi class=&quot;MJX-variant&quot; mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>&amp;#x2032;</mi><mn>2</mn></mrow></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>3</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>45</mn></math>" role="presentation">

clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-239" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-241" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-242" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-243" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">×</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-244" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">45</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.252em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mi class="MJX-variant" mathvariant="normal">′</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>45</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-10">\rm v^{\prime2}=v^2-2as\Rightarrow0=3^2-2a\times45</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-11-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>90</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-245" style="width: 8.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.297em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1007.3em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-246"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-247" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-248" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-249" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-250" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-251" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-252" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">90</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-253" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-254" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-255" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-256" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-257"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-258"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-259" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-260"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-262" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>9</mn>
                                        <mn>90</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0.1</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-11">\rm \therefore a=\frac{9}{90}=0.1\ m/s^2</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-12-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>400</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>600</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-263" style="width: 16.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.895em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1013.86em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-264"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-265" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-266" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-267" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-268" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-271" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-272" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-273"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-274" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">400</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-275" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-281" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-282" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-283" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>400</mn>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                            <mn>600</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>0.1</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>100</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-12">\rm \therefore F=ma=\left(400+600\right)\times0.1=100\ N</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-13-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>u</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>=</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub><mo>+</mo><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi></math>" role="presentation">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-13">\rm m_1u_1+m_2u_2=(m_1+m_2)v</script>
                    </span> সূত্র লেখার জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-14-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>v</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-310" style="width: 4.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.568em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.53em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-311"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">v</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-314" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-317"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-318"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">v</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-14">\rm v=3\ m/s</script>
                    </span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-15-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>9</mn><mn>90</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>0.1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mo>/</mo></mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-321" style="width: 7.953em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.518em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1006.52em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-322"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-325" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">9</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-328" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0.1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-332"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-333"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-334" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">/</span></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-335"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-336" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-337" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>9</mn>
                                        <mn>90</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0.1</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                        <mo>/</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-15">\rm a=\frac{9}{90}=0.1\ m/s^2</script>
                    </span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    সূত্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-16-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-338" style="width: 3.363em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.748em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.75em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-339"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-340" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-343" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-16">\rm F=ma</script>
                    </span> সূত্র লেখার জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-17-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>100</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-344" style="width: 4.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.691em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.65em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-345"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-346" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-347" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-348" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">100</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-349" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-350" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>100</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-17">\rm F=100\ N</script>
                    </span> মান নির্ণয়ের জন্য; ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে। সূত্র না লিখে সরাসরি
                    মান বসালেও সূত্রের জন্য বরাদ্দকৃত নম্বর পাবে।]
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
        <h2>Chemistry (8)</h2>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 9</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>As এর ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাস লিখ এবং সর্বশেষ ইলেকট্রনটির জন্য কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার সেট
                                        গণনা কর।</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mrow>

                                        <mn>33</mn>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">→</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>

                                    </msup>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm As\left(33\right)\rightarrow1s^2\ 2s^2\ 2p^6\ 3s^2\ 3p^6\ 3d^{10}\ 4s^2\ 4p^3\ </script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>সর্বশেষ ইলেকট্রনটি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>4</mn><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>z</mi></msub></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="width: 1.477em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.19em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-402"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-404"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">z</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">z</mi>
                                    </msub>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\rm4p_z</script>
                    </span> অরবিটালে প্রবেশ করে।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-408"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-409" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\therefore</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার সেট হবে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-410" style="width: 9.428em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.707em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1007.62em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-411"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-414" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-416" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-419" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-420" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-421" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-422" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-424" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm n=4,\ l=1,\ m=+1</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-426" style="width: 6.109em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1005em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-427"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-428" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-429" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-430" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">+</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-431"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.494em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-432" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-433" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-434" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-435" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.29em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-439" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.49em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.494em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.602em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm s=+\frac{1}{2}  or  -\frac{1}{2}</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;&nbsp;</p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টনঃ</strong><br>
                    As এর ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাসের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>,</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="width: 2.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.092em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.09em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-441"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-442" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">m</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\rm n, l, m</script>
                    </span> ও s&nbsp;এর মান নির্ণয়ের জন্য (০.৫<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-24-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-447" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-448"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.703em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-24">\times</script>
                    </span>৪) = ০২ নম্বর।
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 10</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>Cr এর ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাস লিখ এবং সর্ববহিঃস্থ স্তরের ইলেকট্রনটির জন্য কোয়ান্টাম
                                        সংখ্যার সেট গণনা কর।</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-18-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>24</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><mn>1</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>2</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>6</mn></msup><mn>3</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mn>5</mn></msup><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mn>1</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-351" style="width: 14.674em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.01em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-376" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-378"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.986em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">p</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-380" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">6</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-382"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-384" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-386"><span style="display: inline-block; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mn>24</mn>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">→</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                        <mn>6</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">p</mi>
                                        <mn>6</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                        <mn>5</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-18">\rm Cr\left(24\right)\rightarrow1s^22s^22p^6\ 3s^23p^63d^54s^1</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>সর্ববহিঃস্থ স্তরের ইলেকট্রন 4s&nbsp;অরবিটালে বিদ্যমান।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-19-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-389" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-390"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-391" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-19">\therefore</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যার সেট হবে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-20-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-392" style="width: 8.609em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1007.01em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-393"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-398" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-400" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-406" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-20">\rm n=4,\ l=0,\ m=0</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-21-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-407" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-21">\rm s=+\frac{1}{2}</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;or&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-22-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-415" style="width: 3.281em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.666em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>1</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-22">\rm s=-\frac{1}{2}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong><br>
                    Cr এর ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাস লিখলে, ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    সর্ববহিঃস্থ স্তরের ইলেকট্রনটির জন্য কোয়ান্টাম সংখ্যা n, l, m, s এর মান লিখলে, (০.৫<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-23-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-423" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-424"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-425" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.703em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-23">\times</script>
                    </span>৪) = ০২ নম্বর।</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p>চুনাপাথরে বিদ্যমান অম্লীয় মূলকটি হলো <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-436" style="width: 2.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.05em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-437"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-438" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-439"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-440" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.99em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-441"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-442"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-443" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-444" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-445" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm CO_3^{2-}</script>
                    </span>।<br>
                    <strong>বেরিয়াম নাইট্রেট দ্রবণসহ পরীক্ষা:</strong> টেস্টটিউবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-446" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.16em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-447"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-451" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-452" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-453" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>

                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm 2-1\ mL</script>
                    </span> প্রস্তুত দ্রবণ নিয়ে এতে কয়েক ফোঁটা বেরিয়াম নাইট্রেট, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><msub><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi></mrow><mn>3</mn></msub><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm Ba\left({\rm NO}_3\right)_2</script>
                    </span> দ্রবণ যোগ করা হয়।<br>
                    <strong>পর্যবেক্ষণ:</strong> সাদা অধ:ক্ষেপ পড়ল। এ অধ:ক্ষেপ বেরিয়াম কার্বনেট অথবা বেরিয়াম সালফেট–এর
                    জন্য হতে পারে&nbsp;। এতে কয়েক ফোঁটা লঘু&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-469" style="width: 1.764em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.44em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-470"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm HCl</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;যোগ করা হলো । অধ:ক্ষেপ বুদবুদসহ দ্রবীভূত হয়।<br>
                    <strong>সিদ্ধান্ত:&nbsp;</strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation">

                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm CO_3^{2-}\left(aq\right)+Ba\left({\rm NO}_3\right)_2\left(aq\right)\rightarrow \underset{white\ precipitate}{{\rm BaCO}_3\left(s\right)}+2NO_3^-(aq)</script>

                </p>
