                                        <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                    </math></span>
                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm BaCO_3\left(s\right)+2HCl\left(aq\right)\rightarrow BaCl_2\left(aq\right)+ \fbox{$CO_2\left(g\right)$}+H_2O(l)</script>
                        </span></strong></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong><br>
                    চুনাপাথরে বিদ্যমান অম্লীয় মূলকটি হলো <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msubsup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-623" style="width: 2.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.05em, 2.42em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-624"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-626"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-627" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.99em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-628"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-629"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-630" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-631" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.727em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-632" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.447em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <msubsup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msubsup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm CO_3^{2-}</script>
                    </span> লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    উপযুক্ত বিক্রিয়াসহ, সঠিক পরীক্ষা, পর্যবেক্ষণ ও সিদ্ধান্তের জন্য (০.৫<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-633" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-634"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-635" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.703em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\times</script>
                    </span>৪) = ০২ নম্বর।</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 12</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">

                                    <td><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-25-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation">

                                                    </math></span>
                                            </span>
                                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-25">\rm NaCl</script>
                                        </span> লবণের অম্লীয় মূলকটি দ্রবণে কীভাবে শনাক্ত করবে? উপযুক্ত বিক্রিয়াসহ লিখ।
                                    </td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-26-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-456" style="width: 2.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.85em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-457"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-459" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-461" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.002em;"></span></span>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-26">\rm NaCl</script>
                    </span> লবণের অম্লীয় মূলকটি হলো <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-27-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-462" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1001.36em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-463"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-465"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-467" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-27">\rm Cl^-</script>
                    </span>।</p>

                <p><strong>সিলভার নাইট্রেট দ্রবণসহ পরীক্ষা:</strong> টেস্টটিউবে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-28-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>L</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-468" style="width: 3.895em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.199em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1003.16em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-469"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-473" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-474" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-475" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">L</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">L</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-28">\rm 2-1\ mL</script>
                    </span> প্রস্তুত দ্রবণ নিয়ে এতে কয়েক ফোঁটা সিলভার নাইট্রেট <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-476" style="width: 3.977em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.24em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.16em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-477"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-478" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-479" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-480" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-481" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-482"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-484" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-29">\rm (AgNO_3)</script>
                    </span> দ্রবণ যোগ করা হয়।</p>

                <p><strong>পর্যবেক্ষণ:</strong> <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-30-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-486" style="width: 2.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.85em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-487"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-30">\rm AgCl</script>
                    </span> এর সাদা অধঃক্ষেপ পড়ে। ঐ অধঃক্ষেপ লঘু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-31-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-492" style="width: 2.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.215em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.22em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-493"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-494" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-495" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-496"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.781em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-498" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm HNO_3</script>
                    </span> এসিডে অদ্রবণীয়; কিন্তু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-32-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>O</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-499" style="width: 3.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.79em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-500"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-502"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-504" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">O</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-32">\rm NH_4OH</script>
                    </span> দ্রবণে সহজেই দ্রবণীয় হয়।</p>

                <p><strong>সিদ্ধান্ত: </strong>নমুনা লবণে <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-33-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-507" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1001.36em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-508"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-509" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-510"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-511" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-512" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-33">\rm Cl^-</script>
                    </span> আয়ন উপস্থিত ও নিশ্চিত।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position:                 <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong><br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation">

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-36">\rm NaCl</script>
                    </span> লবণের অম্লীয় মূলকটি হলো <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-663" style="width: 1.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.068em, 1001.36em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-664"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-665" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-666"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.904em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-667" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-668" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-37">\rm Cl^-</script>
                    </span> লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    উপযুক্ত বিক্রিয়াসহ,&nbsp;সঠিক পরীক্ষা, পর্যবেক্ষণ ও সিদ্ধান্তের জন্য (০.৫<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-38-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-669" style="width: 0.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.658em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.355em, 1000.49em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-670"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-671" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">×</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.703em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\times</script>
                    </span>৪) = ০২ নম্বর।
                </p>

    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 13</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <p>(a)&nbsp;বন্ধন কোণের ঊর্ধ্বক্রম অনুসারে সাজাও:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-29-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msubsup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo></msubsup><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>S</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">
                                                    <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-542" style="width: 13.303em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.881em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.306em, 1010.62em, 2.647em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-543"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-544" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-545"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.467em, 1000.63em, 4.175em, -999.998em); top: -4.395em; left: 0.747em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-547" style="font-size: 70.7%;                                         <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                    <mo>&lt;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msubsup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                    </msubsup>
                                    <mo>&lt;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-31">\rm (a)\ H_2S<NF_3<NH_4^+<BCl_3</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:SutonnyOMJ">(b)&nbsp;</span></span></span></p>

                <p><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:SutonnyOMJ"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation">

                                </span>&nbsp;</span></span></span>লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:SutonnyOMJ"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>d</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi><mn>3</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                                        <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="width: 4.1em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative;                                         </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                                <msup>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">d</mi>
                                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                                </msup>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>

                                    <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm \left(ii\right)\ d^2sp^3</script>
                                </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;</span></span></span>লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span style="line-height:normal"><span style="font-size:12.0pt"><span style="font-family:SutonnyOMJ"><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msup><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>p</mi></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                                        <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-747" style="width: 3.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative;                                         </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">

    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 14</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">

                                    <td>
                                        <p>(a) সমযোজী বৈশিষ্ট্যের ঊর্ধ্বক্রম অনুসারে সাজাও:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi></math>" role="presentation">

            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>a</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-791" style="width: 13.732em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.232em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>

                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm (a)\ AgF<AgCl<AgBr<AgI</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p style="text-align: justify;">(b)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-814" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-815"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-817"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm NH_3</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;অণুর N&nbsp;পরমাণুতে কেবল একজোড়া মুক্ত ইলেকট্রন থাকায় শুধু একটি H&nbsp;পরমাণুতে আংশিক
                    ধনাত্মক চার্জ সৃষ্টি হয়। ফলে চার্জহীন অপর দুটি H&nbsp;পরমাণু হাইড্রোজেন বন্ধন গঠনে অংশ নেয় না। এজন্য
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-820" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-821"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-822" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-823"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-824" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-825" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm NH_3</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;অণুসমূহের মধ্যে গঠিত H&nbsp;বন্ধনের তীব্রতা ও মাত্রা খুবই কম। এজন্য এর স্ফুটনাঙ্ক বেশি
                    নিম্ন।</p>

                <p style="text-align: justify;"><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p style="text-align: justify;">(a)&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>F</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>C</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>B</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>&amp;lt;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>I</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-826" style="width: 12.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.002em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1009.96em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-827"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-828" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-829" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-830" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">F</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-831" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-832" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-833" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-834" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">C</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-835" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-836" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-838" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-839" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">B</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-840" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&lt;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">I</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi>
                                    <mo>&lt;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                    <mo>&lt;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">B</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>&lt;</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">I</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\rm AgF<AgCl<AgBr<AgI</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;; লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p style="text-align: justify;">(b) <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-845" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-846"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-848"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-850" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm NH_3</script>
                    </span> অণুর N&nbsp;পরমাণুতে কেবল একজোড়া মুক্ত ইলেকট্রন থাকায় শুধু একটি H&nbsp;পরমাণুতে আংশিক
                    ধনাত্মক চার্জ সৃষ্টি হয়; লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    ফলে চার্জহীন অপর দুটি H&nbsp;পরমাণু হাইড্রোজেন বন্ধন গঠনে অংশ নেয় না; লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    এজন্য <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>N</mi><msub><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>H</mi><mn>3</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-851" style="width: 1.969em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.6em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1001.6em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-852"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">N</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-854"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.191em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.74em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">H</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.74em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-856" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">N</mi>
                                    <msub>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msub>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm NH_3</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;অণুসমূহের মধ্যে গঠিত H&nbsp;বন্ধনের তীব্রতা ও মাত্রা খুবই কম; লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 15</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>
                                        <p>পর্যায় সারণির গ্রুপ-2&nbsp;এর মৌলগুলোর হ্যালাইড যৌগের গলনাঙ্কের পার্থক্য
                                            ফাজানের পোলারায়ন নিয়মানুসারে ব্যাখ্যা কর।</p>
                                    </td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><strong>গ্রুপ-2&nbsp;এর মৌলসমূহের হ্যালাইড:&nbsp;</strong></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>C</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>S</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi>B</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-857" style="width: 16.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.691em; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-875" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-876" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">a</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-878"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-882" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-883" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">S<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-884" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-885" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">C<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.043em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-886"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.74em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -3.85em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-889" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-890" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                         </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">BeCl_2,\ MgCl_2,\ CaCl_2,\ SrCl_2,\ BaCl_2</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>পর্যায় সারণিতে একই গ্রুপে যতই নিচ থেকে উপরের দিকে যাওয়া যায় একই চার্জযুক্ত ক্যাটায়নসমূহের আকার
                    কমে যাওয়ার কারণে পোলারায়ন ক্ষমতা বৃদ্ধি পায় এবং যৌগের সমযোজী বৈশিষ্ট্য বৃদ্ধি পায়। ফলে গলনাঙ্ক
                    হ্রাস পায়।</p>

                <p><strong>গলনাঙ্ক ক্রম:</strong>&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>B</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>S</mi><mi>r</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>C</mi><mi>a</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>M</mi><mi>g</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub><mo>&amp;gt;</mo><mi>B</mi><mi>e</mi><mi>C</mi><msub><mi>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>" role="presentation">

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p>গ্রুপ-2&nbsp;এর মৌলসমূহের হ্যালাইডসমূহ উল্লেখ করার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p>গলনাঙ্কের ক্রম সঠিকভাবে লেখার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p>প্রাসঙ্গিক ব্যাখ্যার জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msub><mi>K</mi><mn>3</mn></msub><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>N</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>6</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x2192;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>N</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>6</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="width: 13.322em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.904em;                 <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.8em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1050"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1052"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1054"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1055"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi>F</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi>e</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mn>3</mn>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">Fe^{3+}</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;আয়নের ইলেকট্রন বিন্যাস ইলেকট্রনবক্স পদ্ধতিসহ দেখানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi>F</mi><msup><mi>e</mi><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>+</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="width: 2.215em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.805em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1001.8em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1059"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1060" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">F<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.125em;"></span></span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1061"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.41em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">e</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.453em;"><span class="texatom" id="MathJax-Span-1063"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1064"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1065" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">+</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.153em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi>F</mi>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi>e</mi>
                                        <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
                                            <mn>3</mn>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">Fe^{3+} </script>
                    </span>&nbsp;আয়নের পুনর্বিন্যাস ও সংকরণ দেখানোর জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>[</mo><mrow><mi>F</mi><mi>e</mi><msub><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi>C</mi><mi>N</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>6</mn></msub></mrow><mo>]</mo></mrow><mrow class=&quot;MJX-TeXAtom-ORD&quot;><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo></mrow></msup></math>" role="presentation">

    <div class="row" style="margin-top:20px;">
        <h2>Higher Mathematics (8)</h2>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 17</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">

                                <tr>

                                        </span>&nbsp;বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ ও পরামিতিক সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।</td>

            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>37</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm x^2+y^2+10x-8y+37=0</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>5</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>37</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1151" style="width: 11.109em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.1em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.86em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1152"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1153" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1154" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1155" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1156" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1164" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 4.592em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 4.059em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.178em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1167" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1168" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1169" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mn>5</mn>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mn>4</mn>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                        <mn>37</mn>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm \therefore r=\sqrt{5^2+4^2-37}=2\ </script>
                    </span>&nbsp;একক। (Ans)</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-60-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x00D7;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="width: 20.822em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 17.051em;
