                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>25</mn>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mo>×</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>16</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-60">\rm \Rightarrow x^2+2\times5\times x+25+y^2-2\times4\times y+16=4</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-61-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1217" style="width: 11.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.551em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1009.55em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1218"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1221"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1223"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1225" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1226" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1227" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1228" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.445em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.158em, 1002.91em, 4.387em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1231"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1233"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1242" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                <mo>+</mo>
                                                <mn>5</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>4</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-61">\rm \Rightarrow\left(x+5\right)^2+\left(y-4\right)^2=2^2</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-62-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>1</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1243" style="width: 10.33em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.445em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.699em, 1008.36em, 2.953em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1244"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1245" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1246" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1269" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1270" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mfrac>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </mfrac>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mfrac>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </mfrac>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>1</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-62">\rm \therefore\left(\frac{x+5}{2}\right)^2+\left(\frac{y-4}{2}\right)^2=1</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-63-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1271" style="width: 15.863em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.994em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1012.91em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1272"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1273" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1274" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1288" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1289" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1290" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1291" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1292" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1293" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1294" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1295" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1296" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1297"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1298" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1299" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1300" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1301" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.652em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                            <mn>5</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-63">\rm \therefore\frac{x+5}{2}=cos\theta\Rightarrow x=2cos\theta-5\left(Ans\right)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-64-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1302" style="width: 14.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.822em, 1012.17em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1303"><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1304"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.27em, 4.305em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.654em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1305"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1306" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1307" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1308" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1309" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1310" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1311" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1312" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1313" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1314" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1315" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1316" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1317" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1318" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1319" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1320" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1321" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1322" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1323" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1324" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1325" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1326" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1327" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1328"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1329" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1330" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1331" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1332" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.752em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>4</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-64">\rm \frac{y-4}{2}=sin\theta\Rightarrow y=2sin\theta+4\ \left(Ans\right)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-65-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>5</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1333" style="width: 10.412em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1341" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1342" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1343" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1344" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1345" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1351" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1352" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.994em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1353" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1354" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1355" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1356" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.424em; left: 0.494em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1357" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span>
                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                        <msup>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mo>(</mo>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mo>)</mo>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mo>(</mo>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mo>)</mo>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                    </math></span>
                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-65">\rm \left(x+5\right)^2+\left(y-4\right)^2=2^2</script>
                        </span></strong>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-66-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1358" style="width: 2.502em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.8em, 2.092em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1359"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1360" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1361" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1362" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1363" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.048em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.903em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-66">\rm r=2\ </script>
                    </span>&nbsp;একক; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-67-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1364" style="width: 5.904em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.838em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.8em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1365"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1366" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1367" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1368" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1369" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1370" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1371" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1372" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1373" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1374" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.052em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-67">\rm x=2cos\theta-5</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-68-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1375" style="width: 5.781em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.715em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1004.67em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1376"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1377" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1378" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1379" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1380" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1381" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1382" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1383" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1384" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1385" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-68">\rm y=2sin\theta+4</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><strong>[বি:দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 18</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>কোনো সমবাহু ত্রিভুজের দুইটি শীর্ষ বিন্দু <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-69-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1386" style="width: 7.193em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.889em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.38em, 1005.78em, 2.61em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1387"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1388"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1389" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1390"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1391" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1392" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1393" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1394" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1395" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1396" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1397" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1398" style="padding-left: 0.151em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1399" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1400"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1401" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1402" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1403" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.151em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1404" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1405" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.361em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.32em;"></span></span>
                                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                                        <mrow>
                                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                                            <mrow>
                                                                <mn>0</mn>
                                                                <mo>,</mo>
                                                                <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                                                <mn>0</mn>
                                                            </mrow>
                                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                                        </mrow>
                                                        <mo>,</mo>
                                                        <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                                        <mrow>
                                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                                            <mrow>
                                                                <mn>4</mn>
                                                                <mo>,</mo>
                                                                <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                                                <mn>0</mn>
                                                            </mrow>
                                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                                        </mrow>
                                                    </math></span>
                                            </span>
                                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-69">\rm \left(0,\ 0\right),\ \left(4,\ 0\right)</script>
                                        </span>। এর পরিবৃত্তের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p><img alt="" src="data:image/png;base64," style="width: 80px; height: 95px;"></p>

                <p>ধরি, তৃতীয় বিন্দু&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-70-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>2</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1406" style="width: 9.182em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.502em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1007.46em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1407"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1408"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1409" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1410"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1411" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1412" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1413" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1417" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1418" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1419" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.395em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1001.23em, 4.182em, -999.998em); top: -4.465em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.613em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1420"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1421" style="font-size: 70.7%; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.39em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.395em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                            <mo>,</mo>
                                            <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>0</mn>
                                            <mo>+</mo>
                                            <mn>4</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-70">\rm \left(x,\ y\right) \therefore x=\frac{0+4}{2}=2 </script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-71-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1427" style="width: 15.166em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.42em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.506em; left: 2.953em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1440" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1441" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1442" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1444" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1005.58em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.998em; left: 0.986em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.576em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 4.879em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 4.346em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(2.748em, 1001.03em, 4.797em, -999.998em); top: -4.137em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size2;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1445" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1446" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1447" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1448" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1449" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1450" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.698em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mo>(</mo>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mo>)</mo>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>±</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </msqrt>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-71">\rm \therefore\sqrt{\left(4-2\right)^2+y^2}=4 \therefore y=\pm2\sqrt3</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>ধরি, পরিবৃত্ত&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-72-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1455" style="width: 14.469em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1011.76em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1456"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1457"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1458" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1459" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1460" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1461" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1463" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1464" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1465" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1466" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1467" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1468" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1469" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1470" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">f<span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; height: 1px; width: 0.084em;"></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1471" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1472" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">g</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>

                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>…</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-72">\rm x^2+y^2+2gx+2fy+c=0\ldots\left(i\right)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>এখন, <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-73-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1481" style="width: 2.297em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.887em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.85em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1482"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1483" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1484" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1485" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-73">\rm c=0</script>
                    </span> [মূলবিন্দুগামী]</p>

                <p>বৃত্তটি <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-74-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>0</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1486" style="width: 2.461em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.01em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1001.93em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1487"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1488" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1489" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1490" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1491" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1492" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1493" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-74">\rm (4,\ 0)</script>
                    </span> বিন্দুগামী হলে&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-75-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>8</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1494" style="width: 7.707em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.314em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1006.27em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1495"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1496"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1497" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1498" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1499" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1500" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1501" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1502" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1503" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">8</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1504" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">g</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1505" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1506" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-75">\rm \left(i\right)\Rightarrow 16+8g=0</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-76-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>g</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1507" style="width: 15.125em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.379em;                 <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-77-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1531" style="width: 7.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.436em;                         <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-77">\rm \left(x,\ y\right)\equiv\left(2,\ 2\sqrt3\right)</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;বসিয়ে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-78-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1553" style="width: 3.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.158em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">f</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-78">\rm f=-\frac{2}{\sqrt3}</script>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-79-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>2</mn><mo>,</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-79">\rm \left(x,\ y\right)\equiv\left(2,\ -2\sqrt3\right)</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;বসিয়ে,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-80-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>f</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1586" style="width: 3.076em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.502em;                 <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-81-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1595" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1596"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1597" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span>

                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-81">\therefore</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;&nbsp;নির্ণেয় বৃত্ত:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-82-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1598" style="width: 10.453em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.568em;                         <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-82">\rm x^2+y^2-4x+\frac{4}{\sqrt3}y=0\ </script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>অথবা,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-83-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1620" style="width: 13.117em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.74em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.66em, 2.666em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1621"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1622"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1623" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1624" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1625" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1626" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1628" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-84-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>3</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation">
