position: relative; width: 1.068em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1704" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.95em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -3.523em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.449em;"><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1705"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1706"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1707" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.07em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.068em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1708" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.902em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                        <msqrt>
                                            <mn>3</mn>
                                        </msqrt>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-88">\rm x^2+y^2-4x-\frac{4}{\sqrt3}y=0</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 19</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>কোনো বৃত্ত x ও y অক্ষের ধনাত্মক দিকে যথাক্রমে 7 ও 4 একক অংশ কর্তন করে। বৃত্তটি
                                        মূলবিন্দুগামী হলে এর কেন্দ্র, ব্যাসার্ধ এবং পোলার সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>

                <p>ব্যাসার্ধ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-90-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>65</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">

                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mo>(</mo>
                                                <mfrac>
                                                    <mn>7</mn>
                                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                                </mfrac>
                                                <mo>)</mo>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-90">\rm =\sqrt{\left(\frac{7}{2}\right)^2+\left(2\right)^2}=\frac{\sqrt{65}}{2}\ </script>
                    </span>&nbsp;একক (Ans)</p>

                <p>নির্ণেয় বৃত্ত:&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-91-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1775" style="width: 9.346em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.666em;                 <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-92-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong></p>

                <p>কেন্দ্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-93-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>7</mn><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">

                <p>ব্যাসার্ধ&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-94-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>65</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">

                                        <msqrt>

                                        </msqrt>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>

                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-94">=\frac{\sqrt{65}}{2}\ </script>
                    </span>&nbsp;একক; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-95-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>c</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>o</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi>&amp;#x03B8;</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1843" style="width: 10.371em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.486em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1008.45em, 2.174em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1844"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1845"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1847" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1848" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1849" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1850" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1851" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">c</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1852" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">o</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1853" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1854" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1855" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1856" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1857" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1858" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1859" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1860" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1861" style="font-family: MathJax_Math-italic;">θ</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>7</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">c</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">o</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi>θ</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-95">\rm r^2-7rcos\theta-4rsin\theta=0</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><strong>[বি:দ্র:</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">

font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.031em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1932"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.424em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1933" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">39</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.7em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.367em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1934" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">13</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1000.82em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1935" style="vertical-align: 0.863em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.289em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.031em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1936" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1937" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.035em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.747em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.152em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi>l</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                        <mfrac>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mn>12</mn>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>5</mn>
                                                <mo>×</mo>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mo>+</mo>
                                                <mn>7</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mn>13</mn>
                                        </mfrac>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                        <mfrac>
                                            <mn>39</mn>
                                            <mn>13</mn>
                                        </mfrac>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-99"> \therefore l=\left|\frac{12-5\times\left(-4\right)+7}{13}\right|=\left|\frac{39}{13}\right|=3</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;একক</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-100-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mn>2</mn><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>8</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>16</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1938" style="width: 12.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.289em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1010.25em, 2.215em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1939"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1940" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1941"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1946" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1947" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1002.75em, 3.895em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1957" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1961" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">16</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.198em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>8</mn>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>16</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-100">\rm 2\sqrt{r^2-l^2}=8\Rightarrow r^2-l^2=16</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-101-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>l</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>16</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1962" style="width: 14.633em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.969em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1011.93em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1963"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1964" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1965" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1966" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1967" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1968" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1969" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.699em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.199em, 1000.25em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1970" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">l</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.289em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1971" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">16</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1975" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.822em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.37em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.412em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1977" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1980" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1981" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1982" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1983" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">l</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>16</mn>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>25</mn>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-101">\rm \Rightarrow r^2=l^2+16\Rightarrow r^2=25 \therefore r=5</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;একক&nbsp;(Ans)</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-102-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>1</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></msqrt><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>25</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>17</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1984" style="width: 14.223em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.641em; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 2.543em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 3.035em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 3.568em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.035em, 1001.03em, 4.51em, -999.998em); top: -4.178em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Size1;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1999" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">⇒</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2000" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">25</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2001" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2002" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">17</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2003" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2004" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.552em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mn>4</mn>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>25</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>17</mn>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-102">\rm r=\sqrt{1^2+4^2-k}\Rightarrow25=17-k</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-103-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2005" style="width: 6.846em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.617em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1005.53em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2006"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2007" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2008" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2009" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2011" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-2012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2013" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2014" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2015" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2016" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2017" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>8</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-103">\rm \therefore k=-8\ (Ans)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বণ্টনঃ</strong><br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-104-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>8</mn><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2018" style="width: 3.445em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.83em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.15em, 1002.75em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2019"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2020" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">k</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2021" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2022" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2023" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">8</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2024" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">;</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.203em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>8</mn>
                                    <mo>;</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-104">\rm k=-8;</script>
                    </span> নির্ণয়ের জন্য ১.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-105-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-2025" style="width: 2.256em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.846em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1001.8em, 2.133em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-2026"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-2027" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">r</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-2028" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-2029" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.098em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.953em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">r</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-105">\rm r=5</script>
                    </span> একক; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
                    <strong>[বি:দ্র: একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কর্তন করা হবে।]</strong>
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>

            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p>ধরি, স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-699" style="width: 7.584em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 6.191em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1006.11em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-700"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-701" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-702" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-703" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-705" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-706" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-707" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-708"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-709" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-710" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-711" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-712" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm y-2=m\left(x-1\right)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-713" style="width: 13.527em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.068em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.314em, 1010.99em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-714"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-715" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-716" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">m</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-717" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-721" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-723" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">m</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">…</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-729" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">i</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-730" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>…</mo>
                                    <mo>…</mo>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">i</mi>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\rm \therefore mx-y+2-m=0\ldots\ldots(i)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>কেন্দ্র,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>8</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-731" style="width: 9.51em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.789em;                 <p>ব্যাসার্ধ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-44-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>r</mi><mo>=</mo><msqrt><msup><mn>4</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mn>2</mn><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>11</mn></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm r=\sqrt{4^2+2^2-11}=3</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>শর্তমতে,<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation">

height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -3.277em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -2.58em; left: 0em;">∣<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">3</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.871em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.797em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.202em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                        <mfrac>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mo>+</mo>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                                <mo>+</mo>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <msqrt>
                                                <msup>
                                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                                </msup>
                                                <mo>+</mo>
                                                <mn>1</mn>
                                            </msqrt>
                                        </mfrac>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>3</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm \ \left|\frac{m\left(-4\right)+2+2-m}{\sqrt{m^2+1}}\right|=3</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-46-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>5</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>9</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="width: 11.395em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.346em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mn>4</mn>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>5</mn>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>

                                    <mrow>

                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-46">\rm \Rightarrow\left(4-5m\right)^2=9\left(m^2+1\right) </script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>16</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>40</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">

                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>40</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><msqrt><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>40</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>16</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>)</mo></mrow></msqrt></mrow><mn>32</mn></mfrac><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-844" style="width: 16.682em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.65em; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-864" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-865"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-867" style="font-size: 70.7%; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.66em, 4.141em, -999.998em); clip: rect(0.904em, 1007.26em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 7.256em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-875" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: relative; width: 2.338em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1002.22em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -1.105em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-878"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-881" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">3</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-882"><span style="display: inline-block; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.404em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-885" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1002.34em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 2.338em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 2.603em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>40</mn>
                                            <mo>±</mo>
                                            <msqrt>
                                                <msup>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                                        <mrow>
                                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                                            <mn>40</mn>
                                                        </mrow>
                                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                                </msup>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>4</mn>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mn>16</mn>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mn>7</mn>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                            </msqrt>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>32</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>5</mn>
                                            <mo>±</mo>
                                            <mn>3</mn>
                                            <msqrt>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </msqrt>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm \therefore m=\frac{40\pm\sqrt{\left(-40\right)^2-4\left(16\right)\left(7\right)}}{32}\therefore m=\frac{5\pm3\sqrt2}{4}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-886" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-887"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">\therefore</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;স্পর্শকের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-889" style="width: 13.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.355em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mfrac>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mn>5</mn>
                                                <mo>±</mo>
                                                <mn>3</mn>
                                                <msqrt>
                                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                                </msqrt>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mn>4</mn>
                                        </mfrac>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>

                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>

                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>

                                    <mo>.</mo>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>

                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\rm y-2=\left(\frac{5\pm3\sqrt2}{4}\right)\left(x-1\right)\ (Ans.)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:&nbsp;</strong></p>

                <p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-51-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>|</mo><mfrac><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi></mrow><msqrt><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></msqrt></mfrac><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>3</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-921" style="width: 7.83em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative;                                                     </mrow>
                                                    <mo>+</mo>

                                            <mo>|</mo>

                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                    </math></span>
                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-51">\rm \left|\frac{m\left(-4\right)+2+2-m}{\sqrt{m^2+1}}\right|=3</script>
                        </span></strong>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>m</mi><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-950" style="width: 4.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.936em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">m</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>5</mn>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm m=\frac{5\pm3\sqrt2}{4}</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>5</mn><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>3</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>4</mn></mfrac><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-963" style="width: 10.535em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 8.609em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\rm y-2=\left(\frac{5\pm3\sqrt2}{4}\right)\left(x-1\right)</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;;&nbsp;নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 22</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">
                            <tbody>
                                <tr>
                                    <td>(3, 0)&nbsp;ও (7, 0) বিন্দুগামী এবং y-অক্ষকে স্পর্শ করে এরূপ বৃত্তের সমীকরণ
                                        নির্ণয় কর।</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p>খলিফার নিয়মানুসারে ধরি (3, 0) ও (7, 0) বিন্দুগামী বৃত্তের সমীকরণ,</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-34-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-34">\rm \left(x-3\right)\left(x-7\right)+\left(y-0\right)\left(y-0\right)+k\left\{\left(x-3\right)\left(0-0\right)-\left(y-0\right)\left(3-7\right)\right\}=0</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-35-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-704" style="width: 14.797em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.133em;
