width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-718" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-719" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-720" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">k</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-721" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-722" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-723"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-724" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-725" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-726" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-727" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-728" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>10</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>21</mn>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>4</mn>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-35">\rm \Rightarrow x^2-10x+21+y^2+k\left(4y\right)=0</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-36-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2026;</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>i</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext></math>" role="presentation">

                <p>(i) বৃত্তটির কেন্দ্র <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-37-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">

                                            </mrow>

                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>

                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-38">\rm =\sqrt{5^2+\left(-2k\right)^2-21}=\sqrt{4+4k^2}</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>(i) বৃত্তটি&nbsp;y-অক্ষকে স্পর্শ করে।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-39-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><msqrt><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup></msqrt><mo>=</mo><mrow><mo>|</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>|</mo></mrow><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>25</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-793" style="width: 14.715em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.051em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1012.01em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-794"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-795" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-796" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">&nbsp;</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-797"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 4.018em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.117em, 1003.16em, 4.223em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-798"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-799" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">4</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-800" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-801" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-802"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.301em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-804" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1003.16em, 3.895em, -999.998em); width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 2.502em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main; position: absolute; top: -4.014em; left: 1.969em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-805" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-806" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-807" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-808" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-809" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">|</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-810" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-813" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">4</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-814"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-816" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-817" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-818" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.453em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <mn>4</mn>
                                        <msup>
                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                        </msup>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                        <mn>5</mn>
                                        <mo>|</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>25</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-39">\rm \therefore\ \sqrt{4+4k^2}=\left|5\right|\Rightarrow4+4k^2=25</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-40-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mn>4</mn><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><mn>21</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mo>=</mo><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>21</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-819" style="width: 11.027em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.018em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <msup>

                                    </msup>

                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-40">\rm \Rightarrow4k^2=21\Rightarrow k=\pm\frac{\sqrt{21}}{2} </script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>k এর মান (i) এ বসিয়ে পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-41-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>4</mn><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mfrac><msqrt><mn>21</mn></msqrt><mn>2</mn></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-837" style="width: 16.068em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.158em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.518em, 1013.12em, 3.568em, -999.998em); top: -2.785em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-838"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-839"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-841" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-842" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-843" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-846" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-847" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-859" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.44em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.436em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; padding-left: 0.166em;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-862" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-863" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>10</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>4</mn>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>±</mo>
                                            <mfrac>
                                                <msqrt>
                                                    <mn>21</mn>
                                                </msqrt>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </mfrac>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>21</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-41">\rm x^2+y^2-10x+4\left(\pm\frac{\sqrt{21}}{2}\right)y+21=0</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-42-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>10</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x00B1;</mo><mn>2</mn><msqrt><mn>21</mn></msqrt><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>21</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-866" style="width: 14.961em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 12.256em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.191em, 1012.22em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-867"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-868" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-869" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-870" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-871" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-872" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-873" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-874" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-875" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-876" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-877" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">10</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-878" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-879" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">±</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-880" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-881"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.928em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.95em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-882"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-883" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">21</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1001.11em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.588em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.109em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: -0.08em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; font-family: MathJax_Main; top: -4.014em; left: 0.412em;">−<span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-884" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-885" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-886" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">21</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-887" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-888" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.403em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>10</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>±</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mn>21</mn>
                                    </msqrt>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>21</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-42">\rm \therefore x^2+y^2-10x\pm2\sqrt{21}y+21=0</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:</strong></p>

                <p><strong><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-43-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mrow><mo>{</mo><mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>3</mn><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></mrow><mo>}</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-889" style="width: 31.723em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 25.986em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1025.94em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-890"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-891"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-892" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-893"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-894" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-895" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-903" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-904" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-905" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-906" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-907" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-908"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-909" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-910" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-911" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">0</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-912" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-913" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-914" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-915"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-916" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-917" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-930" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">3</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-931" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-932" style="padding-left: 0.166em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-933" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-934"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-935" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-936" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-952" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">7</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-953" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-954" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">}</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-955" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-956" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>3</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>7</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>0</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>(</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mn>0</mn>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>)</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">k</mi>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>{</mo>
                                            <mrow>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mn>0</mn>
                                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                                        <mn>0</mn>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mo>−</mo>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                                        <mn>0</mn>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                                <mrow>
                                                    <mo>(</mo>
                                                    <mrow>
                                                        <mn>3</mn>
                                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                                        <mn>7</mn>
                                                    </mrow>
                                                    <mo>)</mo>
                                                </mrow>
                                            </mrow>
                                            <mo>}</mo>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                        <mn>0</mn>
                                    </math></span>
                            </span>
                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-43">\rm \left(x-3\right)\left(x-7\right)+\left(y-0\right)\left(y-0\right)+k\left\{\left(x-3\right)\left(0-0\right)-\left(y-0\right)\left(3-7\right)\right\}=0</script>
                        </span>&nbsp;; </strong>লেখার জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।</p>

                <p>k এর মান নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।&nbsp;<br>
                    বৃত্তের সমীকরণ নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।</p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 23</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">

                                <tr>

                                                <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-957" style="width: 2.871em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.349em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.678em, 1002.35em, 2.535em, -999.998em); top: -2.234em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-958"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-959" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-960" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-961" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">x</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.866em;"></span></span>

                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                    </math></span>
                                            </span>
                                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-44">\rm y=x</script>
                                        </span> রেখাটি&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-45-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>70</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">

position: relative; width: 0.971em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.43em, 1000.52em, 4.287em, -999.998em); top: -3.985em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-969" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.357em; left: 0.523em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-970" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 3.988em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-971" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-972" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-973" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-974" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-975" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-976" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-977" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-978" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.225em;">70</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-979" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-980" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.263em;">0</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.237em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.27em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.366em;"></span></span>
                                                </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                                        <msup>
                                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                                        </msup>
                                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                                        <msup>
                                                            <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                            <mn>2</mn>
                                                        </msup>
                                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                                        <mo>+</mo>
                                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                                        <mo>−</mo>
                                                        <mn>70</mn>
                                                        <mo>=</mo>
                                                        <mn>0</mn>
                                                    </math></span>
                                            </span>
                                            <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-45">\rm x^2+y^2+2x+2y-70=0</script>
                                        </span> বৃত্তের একটি জ্যা। উক্ত জ্যা এর দৈর্ঘ্য এবং উক্ত জ্যাকে ব্যাস ধরে অঙ্কিত
                                        বৃত্তের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর।</td>
                                    <td style="vertical-align: bottom; text-align: right;">২.৫</td>
                                </tr>
                            </tbody>
                        </table>

                    </div>
                </div>
            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">

                <p>(i) ও (ii) থেকে পাই,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-47-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>70</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-48-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>&amp;#x21D2;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>35</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>5</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1039" style="width: 13.855em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 11.355em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1011.36em, 2.502em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1040"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1041" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">⇒</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1042" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1043" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1044" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1045" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1046" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1047" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1048" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1049" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">35</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1050" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1051" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1052" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS; padding-left: 0.289em;">∴</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1053" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1054" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1055" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">5</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1056" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1057" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1058" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.297em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.353em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">⇒</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>35</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>5</mn>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>7</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-48">\rm \Rightarrow x^2+2x-35=0\therefore x=5,-7</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>সুতরাং, রেখাটি বৃত্তকে (5, 5) ও&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-49-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>7</mn><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1059" style="width: 3.814em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.117em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.03em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1060"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1061" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1062" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1063" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1064" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1065" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1066" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">7</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1067" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>7</mn>
                                    <mo>,</mo>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>7</mn>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-49">(-7,-7)</script>
                    </span> বিন্দু দুটিতে ছেদ করে।</p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-50-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1068" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1069"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1070" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span>

                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-50">\therefore</script>

                <p>বৃত্তের কেন্দ্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-52-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac><mo>,</mo><mfrac><mn>2</mn><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>2</mn></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1100" style="width: 9.059em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 7.42em;                         <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-52">\rm \left(\frac{2}{-2},\frac{2}{-2}\right)\equiv\left(-1,-1\right)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p>বৃত্তের ব্যাসার্ধ&nbsp;&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-53-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mfrac><mrow><mn>12</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mn>2</mn></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1127" style="width: 6.314em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 5.166em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.74em, 1005.17em, 2.461em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1128"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1129" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mfrac" id="MathJax-Span-1130" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.764em; height: 0px; margin-right: 0.125em; margin-left: 0.125em;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1001.64em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.506em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.818em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1131"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1132" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">12</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1133"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.576em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1134"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1135" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1000.37em, 1.232em, -999.998em); top: -1.678em; left: 0.576em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.039em; border-top: 1.3px solid; width: 0.371em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.322em, 1000.62em, 4.264em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span><span style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.33em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -3.645em; left: 50%; margin-left: -0.162em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1136" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.904em, 1001.76em, 1.191em, -999.998em); top: -1.268em; left: 0em;"><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: 0em; border-top: 1.5px solid; width: 1.764em; height: 0px;"></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.068em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1137" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1138" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">6</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1139"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1140"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1141" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.497em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.852em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mfrac>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mn>12</mn>
                                            <msqrt>
                                                <mn>2</mn>
                                            </msqrt>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </mfrac>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>6</mn>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msqrt>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-53">\rm =\frac{12\sqrt2}{2}=6\sqrt2</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1142" style="width: 0.658em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.535em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.6em, 1000.49em, 2.379em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1143"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1144" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 2.174em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.148em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 0.753em;"></span></span>

                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-54">\therefore</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;বৃত্তের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-55-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>=</mo><msup><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mn>6</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mn>2</mn></msup></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1145" style="width: 12.666em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 10.371em;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>

                <p><span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2234;</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>70</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mtext>&amp;#xA0;</mtext><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>(</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>A</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>n</mi><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>s</mi><mo>.</mo><mo stretchy=&quot;false&quot;>)</mo></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1177" style="width: 15.945em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 13.076em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.232em, 1012.99em, 2.543em, -999.998em); top: -2.17em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1178"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1179" style="font-family: MathJax_AMS;">∴</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1180" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1181" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1182" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1183" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1184" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.49em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1185" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1186" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1187" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1188" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1189" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1190" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1191" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1192" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1193" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1194" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">70</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1195" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1196" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">0</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1197" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mtext" id="MathJax-Span-1198" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">&nbsp;</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1199" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1200" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">A</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1201" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">n</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1202" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">s</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1203" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">.</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1204" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>∴</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>70</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mtext>&nbsp;</mtext>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">(</mo>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">A</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">n</mi>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">s</mi>
                                    <mo>.</mo>
                                    <mo stretchy="false">)</mo>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-56">\rm \therefore x^2+y^2+2x+2y-70=0\ \ (Ans.)</script>
                    </span></p>

                <p><strong>নম্বর বন্টন:&nbsp;</strong><br>
                    জ্যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-57-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>=</mo><mn>12</mn><msqrt><mn>2</mn></msqrt></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1205" style="width: 3.404em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 2.789em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(0.986em, 1002.79em, 2.256em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1206"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1207" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">=</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1208" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.289em;">12</span><span class="msqrt" id="MathJax-Span-1209"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 1.355em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.24em, 1000.45em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0.822em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1210"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1211" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.609em, 1000.49em, 3.895em, -999.998em); top: -4.547em; left: 0.822em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">–</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.076em, 1000.86em, 4.346em, -999.998em); top: -4.055em; left: 0em;"><span style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">√</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.247em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>12</mn>
                                    <msqrt>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msqrt>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-57">\rm =12\sqrt2</script>
                    </span> একক; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
                    বৃত্তের কেন্দ্র&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-58-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><mo>&amp;#x2261;</mo><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn><mo>,</mo><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>1</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1212" style="width: 4.879em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 3.977em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.109em, 1003.89em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1213"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1214" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">≡</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1215" style="padding-left: 0.289em;"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1216" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">(</span><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1217"><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1218" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1219" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1220" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">,</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1221" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.166em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1222" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">1</span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1223" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">)</span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 1.969em;"></span></span></span><span style="display: inline-block; overflow: hidden; vertical-align: -0.348em; border-left: 0px solid; width: 0px; height: 1.302em;"></span></span>
                            </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <mo>≡</mo>
                                    <mrow>
                                        <mo>(</mo>
                                        <mrow>
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                            <mo>,</mo>
                                            <mo>−</mo>
                                            <mn>1</mn>
                                        </mrow>
                                        <mo>)</mo>
                                    </mrow>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-58">\rm \equiv\left(-1,-1\right)</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০.৫ নম্বর।<br>
                    <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-59-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>70</mn><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1224" style="width: 11.559em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.469em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.43em, 2.297em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1225"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1226"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1229" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1230" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1232" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1233" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1234" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1235" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1236" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1237" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">2</span><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1238" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">y</span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1239" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">−</span><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1240" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;                             </nobr><span class="MJX_Assistive_MathML" role="presentation"><math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML">
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <msup>
                                        <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                        <mn>2</mn>
                                    </msup>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">x</mi>
                                    <mo>+</mo>
                                    <mn>2</mn>
                                    <mi mathvariant="normal">y</mi>
                                    <mo>−</mo>
                                    <mn>70</mn>
                                    <mo>=</mo>
                                    <mn>0</mn>
                                </math></span>
                        </span>
                        <script type="math/tex" id="MathJax-Element-59">\rm x^2+y^2+2x+2y-70=0</script>
                    </span>&nbsp;; নির্ণয়ের জন্য ০১ নম্বর।<br>
                    <strong>[বি.দ্রঃ</strong> একক না লিখলে বা ভুল একক লিখলে ০.৫ নম্বর কাটা যাবে।]
                </p>

            </div>

        </div>
    </div>
    <div class="row questionBlock">
        <div class="row question">
            <div class="col-md-12" style="padding-left:0px; padding-right:0px;">
                <div class="row">
                    <div class="serial"><span>Question 24</span></div>
                    <div class="questionText" style="display: block;">
                        <table border="0" cellpadding="1" cellspacing="1" style="width: 100%;">

                                <tr>
                                    <td>একটি বৃত্তের সমীকরণ নির্ণয় কর যার কেন্দ্র (6, 0) এবং যা <span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-54-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">

            </div>
            <div class="row solveText" style=" display: block; padding:10px; color:#077307; overflow-x: auto; background-color: #d7f7d4; ">
                <p>ধরি, প্রদত্ত বৃত্ত ও রেখার ছেদবিন্দু দিয়ে যায় এরূপ বৃত্তের সমীকরণ,&nbsp;<span class="math-tex"><span class="MathJax_Preview" style="color: inherit; display: none;"></span><span class="MathJax" id="MathJax-Element-56-Frame" tabindex="0" style="position: relative;" data-mathml="<math xmlns=&quot;http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML&quot;><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><msup><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>y</mi><mn>2</mn></msup><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>4</mn><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>+</mo><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>k</mi><mrow><mo>(</mo><mrow><mi mathvariant=&quot;normal&quot;>x</mi><mo>&amp;#x2212;</mo><mn>3</mn></mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></math>" role="presentation">
                            <nobr aria-hidden="true"><span class="math" id="MathJax-Span-1007" style="width: 12.051em; display: inline-block;"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 9.879em; height: 0px; font-size: 122%;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(1.027em, 1009.84em, 2.338em, -999.998em); top: -1.965em; left: 0em;"><span class="mrow" id="MathJax-Span-1008"><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1009"><span style="display: inline-block; position: relative; width: 0.945em; height: 0px;"><span style="position: absolute; clip: rect(3.445em, 1000.53em, 4.141em, -999.998em); top: -4.014em; left: 0em;"><span class="mi" id="MathJax-Span-1010" style="font-family: MathJax_Main;">x</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span><span style="position: absolute; top: -4.383em; left: 0.535em;"><span class="mn" id="MathJax-Span-1011" style="font-size: 70.7%; font-family: MathJax_Main;">2</span><span style="display: inline-block; width: 0px; height: 4.018em;"></span></span></span></span><span class="mo" id="MathJax-Span-1012" style="font-family: MathJax_Main; padding-left: 0.207em;">+</span><span class="msubsup" id="MathJax-Span-1013" style="padding-left: 0.207em;"><span style="display: inline-block;
